Package uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps

Class Drone

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.Drone
  • public class Drone
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent the functionality of our drone which flys round the point on our route
